let bigAdd l1 l2 = 
let add (l1, l2) = 
let f a x = 
let(w,res)=a in 
let (y,z)=x in 
let total = y+z+w in
(total/10, (total mod 10)::res) in
let base = (0,[]) in
let args = List.combine(List.rev(0::l1))(List.rev(0::l2)) in
let (_, res) = List.fold_left f base args in
res
in 
removeZero (add (padZero l1 l2))

let rec removeZero l = match l  with
| []-> []
|  h::t -> if h=0 then (removeZero t) else [h]@(removeZero  t)

let padZero l1 l2 = 
let l1 = if (List.length l1)<(List.length l2) then [0;0]@l1 else l1 in
let l2 = if (List.length l2)<(List.length l1) then [0;0]@l2 else l2 in
(l1,l2)
